name: AsAboveSoBelow (Alxinc)
description:
Made in 3-4 days for the unreal mega jam.

The concept is that after interacting with an object that is supposed to grant wishes. An alternate shadow appears. Puzzling ensues 

The game is either single or two player 

Controls:

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: space

Swap character: E

In two player the swap character feature is disabled and the shadow with be controlled via the same keyboard or gamepad

Left: left

Right: right

Jump: num 0
